rpgonline

Class RPGGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame
      • rpgonline.RPGGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.newdawn.slick.ControlledInputReciever, org.newdawn.slick.ControllerListener, org.newdawn.slick.Game, org.newdawn.slick.InputListener, org.newdawn.slick.KeyListener, org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener

    public abstract class RPGGame
extends org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame

    A class with added support for RPGOnline games. This class is based on StateBasedGame. In addtion, some parts of loading (e.g. Music) can be defered by overriding the load method.

    Author:
    Tomas

    • Field Detail

      • max

        private long max
        The maximum value of the loading bar. This should be a long in the range 0 to Long.MAX_VALUE.

      • value

        private long value
        The current value of the loading bar. This should be a long in the range 0 to Long.MAX_VALUE.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RPGGame

        public RPGGame(java.lang.String title)

        Create a new RPGGame.

        The creation of this object will write some information to the log (via RPGOnline.queryVersionData()).

        Parameters:
        title - The name of the game.

    • Method Detail

      • textureLoad

        public abstract void textureLoad(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer container,
                                 RPGGame game,
                                 LoadCounter counter)
                          throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

        A method during which textures are loaded. This should be overridden with a method to load the required textures.

        Parameters:
        container - The container holding the game.
        game - This game.
        counter - An interface providing access to a loading screen.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException - Indicates an internal error occured in the game.

      • load

        public abstract void load(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer container,
                          RPGGame game,
                          LoadCounter counter)
                   throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

        A method during which music and other things that do not require an OpenGL context.

        Parameters:
        container - The container holding the game.
        game - This game.
        counter - An interface providing access to a loading screen.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException - Indicates an internal error occured in the game.
